issue.title: sonixgvn.net
issue.body:
### Prerequisites - [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml); - [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue; - [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date; - [X] Browser version is up-to-date; - [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue. ### What product do you use? AdGuard Browser Extension, AdGuard Content Blocker ### AdGuard version Version 4.3.64 ### What type of problem have you encountered? Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc. ### Which browser(s) do you use? Firefox, Chrome ### Which device do you use? Desktop ### Where is the problem encountered? https://sonixgvn.net/ ### Ad Blocking AdGuard Base filter ### Privacy _No response_ ### Social Widgets _No response_ ### Annoyances _No response_ ### Security _No response_ ### Other _No response_ ### DNS filters _No response_ ### Language-specific _No response_ ### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled? _No response_ ### Add your comment and screenshots 1. I know there was an issue [before](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/166320). But, it looks like it cover whole screen instead. What do you think? 2. Screenshots
Screenshot 1:
Screenshot N:
### Privacy - [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
@AdamWr since this is a filehosting site. I can see that the download URL is covered by ads. Is it possible for the adblocker to not cover this element?
ie: https://sonixgvn.net/zettai-meirei-isekai-soushin-party-theme-song-cd/

issue.title: www.tesco.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.tesco.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.tesco.com%2F) ### Comment > It only happens in chromium based browsers. I've uploaded screenshots of the site working in Firefox and Duckduckgo whilst AdGuard is enabled. > This happens on two android 14 devices, and a Samsung Tablet S8 Ultra. > > Cheers! 🍻 Username: `@GhostOfJericho72` ### Screenshots
